SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FST_RGST_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FST_RGST_DTM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_MDFC_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , CLINR_RGNO , RCP_YM , CLINR_NM , BLD_CD , (SELECT BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS T1 WHERE BLD_CD = T1.BLD_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BLD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APLC_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APLC_DT , APLCNS_NM , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID , IDF_APN_FILE_ID , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID , FMN_CO_SPPT_AMT , CLINR_FXN_AMT , TAX_DDCTAM , CLINR_FXN_AMT - TAX_DDCTAM AS AMT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_STRTDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_STRTDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_ENDDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_ENDDT , (CASE WHEN WRK_ENDDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) WORK_STATUS , RRNO_ENCR , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , '' AS TEL_NUM , ZIP ||' '|| BAS_ADR AS ADDRESS , BNK_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(BNK_CD,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , ACNO_ENCR FROM TB_OGBS_CLINR_BAS /*청소원기본*/ WHERE SUBSTR(APLC_DT,1,6) = #{aplcDt}
AND BLD_CD IN ( SELECT A.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS A /*조직기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS B /*빌딩기본*/ ON A.BLD_CD = B.BLC_CD WHERE A.OG_TP_CD = #{session.orgTpCd} AND B.BLD_NM LIKE #{bnkNm}||'%' )
AND CLINR_NM LIKE '%'|| #{clinrNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY FST_RGST_DTM DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FST_RGST_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FST_RGST_DTM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FNL_MDFC_DTM, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS FNL_MDFC_DTM , CLINR_RGNO , RCP_YM , CLINR_NM , BLD_CD , (SELECT BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS T1 WHERE BLD_CD = T1.BLD_CD AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BLD_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APLC_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS APLC_DT , APLCNS_NM , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID , IDF_APN_FILE_ID , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID , FMN_CO_SPPT_AMT , CLINR_FXN_AMT , TAX_DDCTAM , (CLINR_FXN_AMT - TAX_DDCTAM) AS AMT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_STRTDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_STRTDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(WRK_ENDDT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS WRK_ENDDT , (CASE WHEN WRK_ENDDT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS WORK_STATUS , RRNO_ENCR , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , '' AS TEL_NUM , ZIP ||' '|| BAS_ADR AS ADDRESS , BNK_CD , (SELECT FNIT_NM FROM TB_RVDW_FNIT_CD WHERE LPAD(BNK_CD,3,0) = FNIT_CD) AS BNK_NM , ACNO_ENCR FROM TB_OGBS_CLINR_BAS /*청소원기본*/ WHERE DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SUBSTR(APLC_DT,1,6) = #{aplcDt}
AND BLD_CD IN ( SELECT A.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_OG_BAS A /*조직기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS B /*빌딩기본*/ ON A.BLD_CD = B.BLC_CD WHERE A.OG_TP_CD IN ('W01', 'W02') /*WELLS M조직, P조직*/ AND B.BLD_NM LIKE #{bnkNm}||'%' )
AND CLINR_NM LIKE '%'|| #{clinrNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY FST_RGST_DTM DESC
